UPDATE employee
username = #{username}, name = #{name}, gender = #{gender}, job_title = #{jobTitle}, hire_date = #{hireDate}, dept_id = #{deptId}, phone = #{phone}, salary = #{salary}, image = #{image}, update_time = #{updateTime}, password = #{password}, is_first_logged = #{isFirstLogged},

mapper.select: SELECT e.id, e.username, e.password, e.is_first_logged AS isFirstLogged, r.name AS roleName FROM employee e LEFT JOIN role r ON e.role_id = r.id AND r.is_deleted = 0 WHERE e.is_deleted = 0 AND e.username = #{username}

SELECT CASE job_title WHEN 1 THEN 'Student Affairs Coordinator' WHEN 2 THEN 'Curriculum Specialist' WHEN 3 THEN 'Academic Advisor' WHEN 4 THEN 'Career Counselor' WHEN 5 THEN 'HR Manager' WHEN 6 THEN 'Administrative Officer' END AS jobTitle, COUNT(*) AS count FROM employee WHERE is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY job_title
SELECT CASE gender WHEN 1 THEN 'Male' WHEN 2 THEN 'Female' END AS gender, COUNT(*) AS count FROM employee WHERE is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY gender
